text: Wo le rɔ, Haruna wa don yɔrɔ sɛniman kɔndɔ tuma tuma nde Allabatala ɲakɔrɔ, saninfɛdɛ wo ri kɛ a tin na. Wo ri a yiraka ko Haruna ye a lɔla Isirayɛlikailu la kojuuilu kunko la, ii ka mɛnilu kɛ ii la sarakailu bɔ tuma. Ikomin saninfɛdɛ ni a sɛbɛli wo ri kɛ Haruna tin na, n di sɔn Isirayɛlikailu la sarakailu rɔ.
